title: Make Social Media Links Clickable with Real URLs

requirements.text: In the Footer component (frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx), update the Facebook, Instagram, and YouTube social media link elements to use the following real URLs and open in a new tab: YouTube → https://youtube.com/@evergreengamerz?si=2Bqwy16GG-4GhUj-, Facebook → https://www.facebook.com/share/1AWvNBtfuD/, Instagram → https://www.instagram.com/evergreenhub2026?igsh=bm1icXo1bWxrNTMw. Each link must have target='_blank' and rel='noopener noreferrer'.

quotes: Jo jesa h wesa hi rahe bss click laga do jaha jaha youtube, insta or Facebook ka h

acceptanceCriteria: Footer YouTube icon/link navigates to https://youtube.com/@evergreengamerz?si=2Bqwy16GG-4GhUj- in a new tab
Footer Facebook icon/link navigates to https://www.facebook.com/share/1AWvNBtfuD/ in a new tab
Footer Instagram icon/link navigates to https://www.instagram.com/evergreenhub2026?igsh=bm1icXo1bWxrNTMw in a new tab
Visual appearance of footer remains unchanged

requirements.text: In the InstagramSection component (frontend/src/components/InstagramSection.tsx), update the Instagram follow/view-profile links to use the real URL https://www.instagram.com/evergreenhub2026?igsh=bm1icXo1bWxrNTMw with target='_blank' and rel='noopener noreferrer'.

quotes: Jo jesa h wesa hi rahe bss click laga do jaha jaha youtube, insta or Facebook ka h

acceptanceCriteria: InstagramSection follow and view-profile buttons/links navigate to https://www.instagram.com/evergreenhub2026?igsh=bm1icXo1bWxrNTMw in a new tab
Visual appearance of InstagramSection remains unchanged

requirements.text: In the YouTubeSection component (frontend/src/components/YouTubeSection.tsx), update the subscribe button and any channel links to use the real YouTube channel URL https://youtube.com/@evergreengamerz?si=2Bqwy16GG-4GhUj- with target='_blank' and rel='noopener noreferrer'.

quotes: Jo jesa h wesa hi rahe bss click laga do jaha jaha youtube, insta or Facebook ka h

acceptanceCriteria: YouTubeSection subscribe button navigates to https://youtube.com/@evergreengamerz?si=2Bqwy16GG-4GhUj- in a new tab
Visual appearance of YouTubeSection remains unchanged

requirements.text: Scan all remaining frontend components and pages (including FacebookSection.tsx, Header.tsx, MobileSidebar.tsx, AboutUs.tsx, and any other files containing social media links) and update any placeholder or empty Facebook, Instagram, and YouTube links with the real URLs: YouTube → https://youtube.com/@evergreengamerz?si=2Bqwy16GG-4GhUj-, Facebook → https://www.facebook.com/share/1AWvNBtfuD/, Instagram → https://www.instagram.com/evergreenhub2026?igsh=bm1icXo1bWxrNTMw. All links must open in a new tab with rel='noopener noreferrer'.

quotes: Jo jesa h wesa hi rahe bss click laga do jaha jaha youtube, insta or Facebook ka h

acceptanceCriteria: No social media link anywhere on the site points to a placeholder, '#', or incorrect URL
All YouTube links resolve to the correct channel
All Facebook links resolve to the correct profile/page
All Instagram links resolve to the correct profile
All social links open in a new browser tab

constraints: Do not alter the visual design, layout, or styling of any component — only update href/URL values and add target/rel attributes
Do not modify any files listed in frontend.immutablePaths
